title: Tin Broadsword
summaries: The Tin Broadsword is the second weakest ore-crafted broadsword, being slightly stronger than its alternate (the Copper Broadsword) in terms of damage. It is weaker than the Iron/Lead Broadsword tier by 2 damage and stronger than the Wooden Sword tier by 2 damage. As with all broadswords, this sword swings in an arc, which is more useful for killing flying and jumping enemies than shortswords.
